  • Method Details

    • connect

      Many<Event> connect()
      Stream the events reaching the Lichess user in real time.
      When the stream opens, all current challenges and games are sent.

    • challenge

      One<Challenge> challenge(String userId, Consumer<ChallengesApiAuthCommon.ChallengeBuilder> params)
      The challenge expires after 20s if not accepted.

    • challengeKeepAlive

      Many<Challenge> challengeKeepAlive(String userId, Consumer<ChallengesApiAuthCommon.ChallengeBuilder> params)
      The challenge is kept alive until the stream is closed.

    • show

      One<ChallengeInfo> show(String challengeId)
      Show one challenge.
      Get details about a challenge, even if it has been recently accepted, canceled or declined.
      Parameters:
      challengeId - the id of the challenge to show
